name: Herda: The Rescue Owl
description:
The kingdom is falling apart!
Help Helda the owl save all the villagers
from plummeting to their death, and save the kingdom!

Controls
  • E - Snatch
  • WASD - Steering
  • Press space - Flap your wings
Credits

Daniel Kierkegaard Andersen: Programmer + UI

Simon Christian Dockweiler: Programmer + Owl tamer

Harpa Ellertsdóttir: Graphical Genius

HotShot: Sound (which there is none of)
